From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From nou, or from Latin renovāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central) [rə.nuˈβa]
  • IPA(key): (Balearic) [rə.noˈva]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [re.noˈvaɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)

Verb

[edit]

renovar (first-person singular present renovo, first-person singular preterite renoví, past participle renovat); root stress: (Central, Valencia, Balearic) /ɔ/

  1. to renovate

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of renovar (first conjugation)
infinitive renovar
gerund renovant
past participle masculine feminine
singular renovat renovada
plural renovats renovades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present renovo renoves renova renovem renoveu renoven
imperfect renovava renovaves renovava renovàvem renovàveu renovaven
future renovaré renovaràs renovarà renovarem renovareu renovaran
preterite renoví renovares renovà renovàrem renovàreu renovaren
conditional renovaria renovaries renovaria renovaríem renovaríeu renovarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present renovi renovis renovi renovem renoveu renovin
imperfect renovés renovessis renovés renovéssim renovéssiu renovessin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — renova renovi renovem renoveu renovin
negative (no) — no renovis no renovi no renovem no renoveu no renovin

Derived terms

[edit]
  • renovable

Related terms

[edit]
  • renovació

Further reading

[edit]
  • “renovar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “renovar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “renovar” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “renovar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Interlingua

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

renovar

  1. to renew, to renovate

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of renovar
infinitive renovar
participle present perfect
renovante renovate
active simple perfect
present renova ha renovate
past renovava habeva renovate
future renovara habera renovate
conditional renovarea haberea renovate
imperative renova —
passive simple perfect
present es renovate ha essite renovate
past esseva renovate habeva essite renovate
future essera renovate habera essite renovate
conditional esserea renovate haberea essite renovate
imperative sia renovate —

Related terms

[edit]
  • renovabile
  • renovation
  • renovator

Occitan

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio (Béarn):(file)
This entry needs pronunciation information. If you are familiar with the IPA then please add some!

Verb

[edit]

renovar

  1. to renovate

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From novo, or from Latin renovāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ʁe.noˈva(ʁ)/ [he.noˈva(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ʁe.noˈva(ʁ)/ [he.noˈva(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /ʁe.noˈva(ɾ)/ [he.noˈva(ɾ)]
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /ʁe.noˈva(ʁ)/ [χe.noˈva(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /ʁe.noˈva(ɻ)/ [he.noˈva(ɻ)]
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ʁɨ.nuˈvaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ʁɨ.nuˈvaɾ/
    • (Northern Portugal) IPA(key): /ʁɨ.nuˈbaɾ/ [ʁɨ.nuˈβaɾ]
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /ʁɨ.nuˈva.ɾi/

Verb

[edit]

renovar (first-person singular present renovo, first-person singular preterite renovei, past participle renovado)

  1. to renew, renovate, refurbish

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of renovar (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)
Infinitive
Impersonal renovar
Personal renovar renovares renovar renovarmos renovardes renovarem
Gerund
renovando
Past participle
Masculine renovado renovados
Feminine renovada renovadas
Indicative
Present renovo renovas renova renovamos renovais renovam
Imperfect renovava renovavas renovava renovávamos renováveis renovavam
Preterite renovei renovaste renovou renovamos1, renovámos2 renovastes renovaram
Pluperfect renovara renovaras renovara renováramos renováreis renovaram
Future renovarei renovarás renovará renovaremos renovareis renovarão
Conditional renovaria renovarias renovaria renovaríamos renovaríeis renovariam
Subjunctive
Present renove renoves renove renovemos renoveis renovem
Imperfect renovasse renovasses renovasse renovássemos renovásseis renovassem
Future renovar renovares renovar renovarmos renovardes renovarem
Imperative
Affirmative renova renove renovemos renovai renovem
Negative (não) não renoves não renove não renovemos não renoveis não renovem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Related terms

[edit]
  • renovação

Further reading

[edit]
  • “renovar” in Dicionário Aberto based on Novo Diccionário da Língua Portuguesa de Cândido de Figueiredo, 1913

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin renovāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /renoˈbaɾ/ [re.noˈβ̞aɾ]
  • Audio (Colombia):(file)
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: re‧no‧var

Verb

[edit]

renovar (first-person singular present renuevo, first-person singular preterite renové, past participle renovado)

  1. (transitive) to renovate
  2. (transitive) to renew

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of renovar (o-ue alternation) (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive renovar
gerund renovando
past participle masculine feminine
singular renovado renovada
plural renovados renovadas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present renuevo renuevastú
renovásvos 		renueva renovamos renováis renuevan
imperfect renovaba renovabas renovaba renovábamos renovabais renovaban
preterite renové renovaste renovó renovamos renovasteis renovaron
future renovaré renovarás renovará renovaremos renovaréis renovarán
conditional renovaría renovarías renovaría renovaríamos renovaríais renovarían
subjunctive yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present renueve renuevestú
renovésvos2 		renueve renovemos renovéis renueven
imperfect
(ra) 		renovara renovaras renovara renováramos renovarais renovaran
imperfect
(se) 		renovase renovases renovase renovásemos renovaseis renovasen
future1 renovare renovares renovare renováremos renovareis renovaren
imperative — tú
vos 		usted nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ustedes
affirmative renuevatú
renovávos 		renueve renovemos renovad renueven
negative no renueves no renueve no renovemos no renovéis no renueven

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

    Selected combined forms of renovar (o-ue alternation)

These forms are generated automatically and may not actually be used. Pronoun usage varies by region.

singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
with infinitive renovar dative renovarme renovarte renovarle, renovarse renovarnos renovaros renovarles, renovarse
accusative renovarme renovarte renovarlo, renovarla, renovarse renovarnos renovaros renovarlos, renovarlas, renovarse
with gerund renovando dative renovándome renovándote renovándole, renovándose renovándonos renovándoos renovándoles, renovándose
accusative renovándome renovándote renovándolo, renovándola, renovándose renovándonos renovándoos renovándolos, renovándolas, renovándose
with informal second-person singular tú imperative renueva dative renuévame renuévate renuévale renuévanos not used renuévales
accusative renuévame renuévate renuévalo, renuévala renuévanos not used renuévalos, renuévalas
with informal second-person singular vos imperative renová dative renovame renovate renovale renovanos not used renovales
accusative renovame renovate renovalo, renovala renovanos not used renovalos, renovalas
with formal second-person singular imperative renueve dative renuéveme not used renuévele, renuévese renuévenos not used renuéveles
accusative renuéveme not used renuévelo, renuévela, renuévese renuévenos not used renuévelos, renuévelas
with first-person plural imperative renovemos dative not used renovémoste renovémosle renovémonos renovémoos renovémosles
accusative not used renovémoste renovémoslo, renovémosla renovémonos renovémoos renovémoslos, renovémoslas
with informal second-person plural imperative renovad dative renovadme not used renovadle renovadnos renovaos renovadles
accusative renovadme not used renovadlo, renovadla renovadnos renovaos renovadlos, renovadlas
with formal second-person plural imperative renueven dative renuévenme not used renuévenle renuévennos not used renuévenles, renuévense
accusative renuévenme not used renuévenlo, renuévenla renuévennos not used renuévenlos, renuévenlas, renuévense

Derived terms

[edit]
  • renovable
  • renovación
  • renovador
  • renovar la herida
  • renovar la memoria
  • renuevo
